bibl.title: It is Our Father Who Writes: Orders from the Monastery of Apollo at Bawit. (American Studies in Papyrology. 43.)
bibl.note: P. Bawit Clackson 1-91. - Part I. Introduction. - Part II. The Texts: Orders authorized by a signatory (1-27); - Texts with no signatory (28-59); - Text excavated at Wadi Sarga (60); - Fragmentary Our Father-formula documents (61-71); - Texts written on the other side of Our Father-formula documents (72-91). - Part III. Indexes. - Part IV. References. - Part V. Plates.
bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah J., It is Our Father Who Writes: Orders from the Monastery of Apollo at Bawit. (American Studies in Papyrology. 43.)
Cincinnati, Ohio, American Society of Papyrologists, 2008, 4Â°, xviii-146 pp., tabl. et 39 pll. ISBN 978-0-9700591-5-4. $50.
